name: a fair race
description:
Sometimes your W key is broken. Sometimes life sucks. And there's nothing we can do about them.

But fortunately we don't need much to have fun.

Controls:

- W to run

- Mouse to look around

- And some other keys that do things 

(spoilers: 1 6 L G Z X C V . )

Prompt: "A game that anyone can win but you."
